When the wearer scores the first successful {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} on their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the target will suffer from {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}. a318eca0-638b-470a-a333-31c041bbde1c:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Follower
This helmet grants its wearer immunity to enemy critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} for the first 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g} of combat.
ad903c56-e313-4f6b-a34d-ea0b892f31e1:
Requires {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g}
The wearer of this helmet gains +<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}. The helmet also grants a bonus to Fellowship equal to <u>(2 × Iconoclast rank)</u>.
33d5411b-56d3-4511-97b4-f97b39de95ee:
The wearer gains + 10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}.
Once per combat, whenever the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 35%, the wearer gains +<u>(3 × TGH {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> wounds.

55cade31-6194-47e0-9b71-da95cb62126e:

The wearer suffers −35% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}.

55a2a195-2b20-4f25-8c9d-71b3a99d6759: When the wearer uses Machine Spirit Communion, their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} is increased by +5 for each affected target until the end of combat.

663ddc2d-b6e6-424c-8310-55ff81a8af87: Whenever the wearer kills a target with a single {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attack for the first time in combat, the wearer immediately gains an additional attack this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
a03e980a-fe6d-4b49-85ab-b03b65dd62a4: Whenever the wearer successfully {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an incoming attack, they gain +10 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.
2625c0af-158a-4797-b06a-d53f91978b6f:
Whenever the wearer uses a psychic power, they can trigger one of the following:
-<indent=5%>50% chance to reduce the {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} cost and decrease {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} by -2</indent>
-<indent=5%>25% chance to perform the psychic power as usual</indent>
-<indent=5%>25% chance to increase veil degradation by +3 and reset the cooldown of their attack</indent>
If veil degradation is increased to 15 or beyond, this {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} triggers {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g} even when using minor psychic powers.
fb5b3ddc-7cb3-4a1e-99f2-d54021136e7b: Whenever the wearer uses an attack that is of a different type than the previous attack, they gain {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.
